mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM todo WHERE date_format(targetdate, '%Y-%m-%d') < date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM todo WHERE date_format(targetdate, '%Y-%m-%d') < date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND done = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM todo WHERE date_format(targetdate, '%Y-%m-%d') < date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY targetdate DESC LIMIT #{dispCount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM todo WHERE date_format(targetdate, '%Y-%m-%d') > date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
